Title: The Friars Club
Plot: George is happy because he has a three-month reprieve. The wedding is delayed until June (just in time for the end of the May sweeps and a cliffhanger!). Meanwhile he is also excited because Jerry is going to go out with Susan's best friend. He envisions their friendship in the future as being "Gatsby"-like. Jerry is trying to get into the Friars Club, but loses a jacket he "borrowed" for dinner there, at a performance of comedic jugglers that was "worked on" by Susan's friend. Kramer tries to d
GuestStars: Heidi Swedberg, John O'Hurley, Phil Morris, Rob Schneider, Pat Cooper, Samantha Smith, Lisa Kushell, Robert Martin Robinson, Norman Large, Peggy Lane, The Flying Karamazov Brothers
